title: Dozz
description: Welcome to Dozz, created by Dylan CAETANO, thanks again for downloading one of my iOS apps.

title: List of races
description: This application will help you make your shopping lists, and on top of that it's a wonderful interface for you, my favourite users.

title: Tick the boxes
description: The aim is to tick the boxes when you find a food item in the shop. Once ticked, you can either delete it or it will move to the bottom of the list.
